content.detailedDescription: I noticed a shaped above my house ran in the house and got my phone to video tape it while it made no noise. once i was video-taping it , it move away then eventually into the sky beyond my view point like the heaven swallowed it up.  10 mins later a huge thunderstorm rolled in quickly and could not see a single thing.  it had not rained in the area in months prior to this thunderstorm.  it is not the first time i've witnessed objects in the sky in my area. its been close to 9 years i've seen multiple objects in the sky fly in werid patterns like the stars came alive. i've witness a star float across the moon from one side to the other and multiple objects at one time.  lately my observations are becoming almost daily with a bright object appearing with different colors hoovering and moving erratic in my area.  i've seen bell shape objects and disk and star like.My first encounter was in 2005 when one object was following me home.  i grabbed a camera and zoomed in and noticed strange writings on the bottom and sides of the disk making no noise and drained my camera's battery on one sighting.
content.summary: It was bell-shaped and make no noise, hovering then acended to the sky, rained to zero visibaliity shortly after 10 mins

content.detailedDescription:
9/5/14, starting around 9.30 pm, a friend and i had just gotten out of her car at her home in greensboro, nc, near-north part of town [about a half mile from friendly shopping center; light pollution not an issue].  the sky was relatively clear in the west, where i observed what at first i thought was a star roughly 20 degrees off the western horizon, due west.  i am a stargazer and have even had an astronomy course or two...  simply to say i'm fairly familiar with the better-known cataloged heavenly objects.  this "star" was stationary and about the size of sirius, but the coloration was wrong, and the quality of the light was .. unusual.  i pointed this out to my friend, and we observed it for about 20-25 minutes.  
     the "star" was white, slightly toward yellow.  rather than the blue-white one sees around sirius, this one had a dominant red-flash pattern.  there was the slightest hint of yellow-orange-to-red starting at the edge of the white core to the clearly red beams, as well as a softer blue that i could only barely see, but my friend definitely saw the blue.  also, the blue wasn't just star beams flashing; it also seemed to be more "around" the object, quite dull compared to the red beams.
     the quality of light is what first captivated me and was also commented on by my friend.  where one might describe sirius as kind of "sharp" in its ambient appearance, this was quite bright like sirius, but softer; yet the scintillating beams, such as one observes around sirius or any star, were strong.  for the most part during our watching it, it appeared to be unobscured, but during the last few minutes, it seemed to dim, suggesting cloud wisps, but was never entirely out of sight.
     an intriguing incident occurred when the flashing red light of what may have been a small airplane flew, in relation to our observation point, toward the star-like object, at an angle from about 7-2 o'clock.  then from �gan inch or so out�h clearly it seemed to fly around the ufo as if to avoid it, from about 9 o�fclock to 12 o�fclock, at which point it abruptly changed its flight pattern again and flew upward as if continuing its original trajectory as observed.  if the ufo object is the middle of the clock hypothetically, then the small plane [light] was first noticed at about 7 o�fclock.  once it partially circumvented the considerably larger object to a little past 12 o�fclock, it abruptly continued its upper-angled path from, we can say, 7 o�fclock to [1.30-] 2 o�fclock.
     over the 20 or so minutes we observed it, although it appeared to be stationary like a star, it seemed to drift a bit northward and also appeared to be moving toward the western horizon in the way of stars, etc. setting.  
     when it became dimmed by cloud wisps, and since nothing else was happening, we quit observing.  i have been trying to learn where sirius was during that time, which am fairly sure had not yet risen into visibility in this part of the world yet, but i am very sure this was not sirius.  also it was not jupiter or saturn -- the typical scintillating star beam phenomena were strikingly evident.
content.summary: I and friend observed stationary star-like and unusual object for 20-25 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
My boss and his wife took a vacation in alaska.  the did not see a ufo.  they brought back a set of photographs from the vacation.  i noticed the ufo on one of the developed photographs and pointed it out to them.  both of them said that the image in the photograph was not visible in the sky when the picture was taken.  in addition to the actual developed photograph, i viewed the digital copy of the picture, which was saved on cd.  both pictures match.  there is clearly a disc-shaped object, high in the sky, above the mountain.  the object is cloud-colored (white), with what looks like a light at the top-center of the object.

i showed this picture to everyone that i know.  while some do and some do not believe in ufos, no-one could explain the image.

i hope that you can send me your analysis of what you think this image is.  i can verify that the image has not been doctored in any way.  what makes this the most interesting is that the couple who took the picture did not see a ufo and did not even realize this image was on their picture, until i pointed it out to them.
content.summary: Image of a disc-shaped ufo appeared in a picture taken of a mountain

content.detailedDescription: We had just a the end of our 500km charity walk across the atlas mountains and this was our first day of a bit of tourism.....The photo was shot in ait ben haddou, morrocco which is a very popular place for filming....At the time of the visit, they were filming a religious documentary...I believe it was italian producers, hence the crosses on the picture.  i was not aware of any unusual noise at the time.  the only time i noticed the ufo was when i uploaded the pictures at home and noticed something strange at the far left (3 quarter up) of the picture...I then checked this picture against a couple of other pictures i had taken seconds before and after from the same spot and towards the same direction and there was nothing there so unsure whether it is something that either moved very fast or maybe lol oaf cover..But there weren't that many clouds so can't explain.
content.summary: Only noticed in the photo taken when i returned from my trip to morrocco

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside on my deck when i felt a "uneasy" feeling in my stomach. as i started to go inside i noticed a flash of light out of the corner of my eye. when i looked in the direction of the flash there were 8 to 10 orb like lights close to tree top level doing what looked like figure 8's around each other for about 10 to 15 minutes. these orbs were casting light to the ground and i could see the shadows of the trees on the ground.. in the time the orbs were in my sight my cell phone would not work and my internet and tv both went out. while watching the orbs the "uneasy" feeling i had in my stomach went away and i had a sense of calm come over me. all i could do was stand there and look as the orbs slowly moved from east/north east to west/south west. if i had to guess they were moving at maybe 5 mph or slower. after about 5 minutes of the orbs leaving my sight there was the sound of what i believe was a blackhawk helicopter following the orbs. i did not see the helicopter but they have a very distinct sound.
content.summary: 8 to 10 pulsating orbs flying in a

content.detailedDescription:
I couldn't sleep so i stepped outside to smoke a cigarette. upon walking down the driveway (facing nearly due east), i noticed how cloudless the sky was and how dynamicly the stars appeared in orion & between that constellation and jupiter.

this is a residential suburban neighborhood. after gazing upon sirius because it was so clear and twinkling from blues and purples to whites and greens, i looked over to jupiter (slightly more ne of the constellation).

upon looking at jupiter, i saw an extremly bright white/green "star" at jupiter's 1-2o'clock position (if you will). because i never recalled seeing a heavenly body that dynamic or bright near jupiter before, and knowing that powerlines could easily obscure my view, i walked down the drive more to see the sky beyond the cables.

the white/green light then flashed again, proving that i did see a flash and wasn't getting confused by the powerlines. this time the flash was slightly less large and seemed to be an aircraft headed due east.

i waited for another flash of bright light, as i see planes and heliocopters often in the sky being near piedmont triad airport in greensboro, nc. however: i heard no sounds of an engine or propulsion. the light from this "plane" was not constant with a red and green starboard/port indication.

this light in the sky grew brighter and faded with the deliberate and speed of a lighthouse beacon that brightens and fades as it spins. i was able to see three or four of these cycles as it appeared to head east quickly (i say quickly because after the deliberate cycles from bright to dim, the object was gone from view... seemingly growing smaller as it headed east)

i know what i saw was not typical. i have seen planes and other aircraft at night having grown up outside of newark airport in nj. i have also been lucky enough to have seen the mir space station as it entered the atmosphere near greensboro at about 3:15 am on my way to work years ago. this object faded and brightened to the same white/green color i found unique about witnessing mir. 

i have also seen the geminid and persioid meteor showers before. this soundless light with deliberate speed, direction, and cyclic fades was not anything i have seen before.

it caught me off guard and intrigued me to the point of needing to clarify this with your sight.
content.summary: Stepped out. couldnt sleep. saw it at appx 2 o'clock pos to jupiter

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my 3 children were walking the dogs. my daughter, who's actually studing stars and planets at school, was watching the night sky. suddenly, she called me. and only for a few seconds i could see a flying object inbetween two buildings, and gone.

i was able to see a round yellow light and a smaller red one. they vanished very quickly, it was very fast.

i can assure it was going probably above earth - not sea, and very low altitude. 

very fast and silence.

it didn't seem an airplane or helicopter of any known kind.
content.summary: Me and my 3 children were walking the dogs. my daughter, who's actually studing stars and planets at school, was watching the night sky. suddenly, she called me. and only for a few seconds i could see a flying object inbetween two buildings, and gone.
content.locationName: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto District

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my porch at 450 am est and saw what i thought was a shooting star but i noticed it turned, i looked in the direction for a few seconds and saw it again it looked like a shooting star but it was zig zagging and going up and down, i thought it was also disappearing but im almost certain it was going behind some clouds, i kept watching and realized there were two lights or objects, and it looked like they were playing with eachother they would chase eachother and one circled around the other all while zig zagging back and forth, im sure they weren't bugs or stars because of how they moved and they were up in the sky, i watched for about 5 to 10 minutes they would appear and disappear going behind the cloud cover then didn't see them anymore.
content.summary: I observed what i thought was a shooting star but saw 1 then two objects flying around in a zig zag pattern and acending and decending

content.detailedDescription: On august 17 i woke at about three am to a phone call from a co worker. he called then texted me and showed up at my apartment. he was trying to sleep with me. he knocked on my door and generally fumbled around loudly in the apartment hallway while calling me and trying to get me out of bed. i turned my phone off and lay there. i heard him laugh and there was a strange power tool noise but the door was deadbolted and i did not answer. i am pretty sure he was drunk. he must have woke the neighbors because i heard them move around and water sounds like people using the bathroom. this building is a quadplex and late at night if the air isn't on you can hear sounds. i was a little embarrassed and annoyed so it took me a bit to fallback asleep after he left. that is where i get the timeframe for the occurance. i fell back asleep and at some point i heard a noise at the front door and i woke up enough to think oh, he's back. it sounded like the front door opened and i lay there, feeling something approach my bed. it felt like something leaning over me in the dark and i tried to move but i couldn't. i tried to say help me and i actually did manage a help me with a lot of difficulty. that is different from my other bouts of sleep paralysis. i heard a loud rumbling noise rush at the head of my bed. it sounded a lot like a movie explosion. i couldn't move and i had the thought, oh. i'm going to die. then all the sudden i could move but it was more like i turned on. my heart stuttered into fear and i lay there pretty creeped out. by tuesday i realized part of my bike had been stolen. i had run to work on monday so i didn't notice my bicycle damage. tuesday morning i went outside to unlock my bike and the back tire was missing with the lock attached to the front (dumb me, i know). weird about it is that it was locked under my garage window which was opened. inside my garage is a television and two very nice unlocked bikes. i guess i'm confused why they walked off with my tire. there were also several adult bikes laying around the yard from kids and they weren't locked. i reported it to the police. not the sleep paralysis. not my coworker, either. i don't think someone trying to sleep with me would try and steal my property. plus, i've had other strange theft events lately. i also discovered that same day i reported to the police there was a package delivered that wasn't there. it was a grocery store box and wasn't worth much. but a few days earlier a package disappeared being delivered from a different postal service that never made it past ohio. i used online package tracking and it just disappeared and had to be re delivered. i'm pretty sure the fbi is here or some group is with me. maybe because 9/11 is like sweeps week with me. i was texting that same co worker yesterday and something interesting occurred. he said, yelp. i said if he was making dog noises at me that i prefer bow wow. a few minutes later a man in a truck drove by me walking and said out his open window, woof woof. he had a serious look on his face and i'm guessing he wasn't making an expression about my looks. he looked a little old for that. as a little history i was pregnant with my first son on 9/11 at fifteen which is legally rape and never prosecuted. my 2nd son was born on mother's day which is the anniversary of my first baptism. the day of my 2nd baptism the lottery numbers came up 9911, that is the daily four. i baptized into the church of jesus christ of latter day saints and 9/11 is a date of significance in that church as well as a historic event and the day i gave birth to my rape baby as a teenager. 9/11 is a really big deal so i'm not surprised i have a little company this week. i wish they would just stop and shake my hand and say hello. say something like, hi karen. we are here for observation (or whatever). don't be alarmed if you see us hanging around. for starters i could at least not embarrass myself or be unintentionally rude. sometimes i feel like a caged animal or poked at (not literally). when they do stuff like drive by's it really makes me agitated and upset. it makes me hostile because i am a rape victim and so sorry someone wants to make signs at you through me. it makes me feel like i'm in trouble and i might be prosecuted for giving birth or something. it pisses me off. it scares me and i have been having anxiety attacks since that day and i'm really angry at my co worker and really, even my whole company i'm employed with right now. i just feel agitated and depressed. i do report things to the fbi because i have had many conversations with muslims over the years through chat rooms and these are people who represent they are from overseas. this was after 9/11 and i'm not sure as to the validity of claims to who they are but because of unusual events it seems safer to just let someone know. i would be curious if there were any unusual anything else in my area that night. i am only a mile from a small airport also. i may also be unwell but it has been many years since i've had a bout of sleep paralysis. that's all i have. maybe it's stress the sleep paralysis but someone is here with me right now. some group.
content.summary: Sleep paralysis and property theft

content.detailedDescription:
Was out on the back porch letting a couple of the neighbor kids look at the moon through my telescope. decided they might enjoy a view of albiero. however, my goto isn't working and was having trouble lining it up. i looked up from my scope to make sure the scope was pointing in the right area(light pollution is pretty bad in my neighborhood...) and noticed what i thought was a "shooting star", complete with the "poof" some of the bigger ones make when first entering the atmosphere, appear near algenib in the constellation of pegasus(about the same altitude, but maybe 3-5 degrees to the left of the star...). at first, the object appeared to be a dull white in color with a matching tail of ~5-7 degrees in length. the object traveled in a northerly direction for ~20 degrees, where the tail faded away and a pinpoint spherical object of orange/yellow remained. this sphere continued towards the constellation cassiopeia. i tried to bring the object into focus with my binoculars, but object would not focus and appeared as a fuzzy orange/yellow orb.

it was when the object reached cassiopeia that object appeared to "rebound" off the star schedar, change color to reddish/orange, and started travelling back towards pegasus.(the 2 lads with me swore that they could now see 2 objects travelling back towards pegasus. i didn't, but then again they have younger eyes. however, i didn't see anything else through the binoculars...) about halfway back to pegasus, the object again changed course and appeared to be descending towards the constellation aquarius. 

when object reached the general vicinity of aquarius, the object(which still wouldn't focus through my binoculars and still appeared as a fuzzy orb) changed color again to a dull red and stopped. the orb hovered there for maybe a minute, started to pulsate in intensity, then vanished.

as far as other air traffic in the area, shortly(about 10 minutes) before the encounter, we spotted what appeared to be a private single or double prop plane fly from e to w above us. right after the sighting, a helicopter flew from the se to ne. a few seconds after that, what sounded like a fairly large prop plane flew right over us from ese to wnw, followed immediately by a fast moving jet from the nw, which did a hard banking turn to wsw.

needless to say, the boys(ages 9 & 12) were quite excited about the whole thing, but at the same time a wee bit frightened. the youngest one wouldn't go home without me walking him home, even though he lives only about 75 yards away...
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Observed what i first thought was shooting star enter atmosphere travel north, reverse course, and travel south

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a walk with my family at our local park when my daughter noticed something in the sky which she said was an airplane.  when i first saw it my first though was this was not an airplane.  it made no noise, had a very shinny glow to it (almost white), and seemed like it was just gliding through the air.  it had a contrast to the sky that really made it stand out compared to any airplane i have seem.  there was absolutely no engine trail either.  i did not think much of it at first, but then i decided to take a picture and video of it.  by that time is was starting to get blocked by the trees at the park.  when i started to record it, that is when it seemed to be changing direction.  after looking at the video, it seemed to also to be descending.  earlier it had just been going in a straight line across the sky.  i eventually lost sight of it because of the trees.  i did not have any particular feeling other than wondering what i saw.  i was not able to judge the distance to the object or the size.  i am thinking it was not too close due to the size.
content.summary: Was not an airplane.  best explanation, a drone.  no noise.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were in bed. my mut started growling and barking then proceeded to hide under the table beside the bed, still barking and trawling. my service dog a belgium malimois started to take an aggressive stance looking into the dark out of the bed room. immediately we assumed that our house was being broke into. i secured a weapon and cleared each room one by one. nothing...I went out to the front porch and around the house to include the garage.  when i was in the back yard i looked over the cement wall towards a dark section of the colosac when two yellowish orange lights caught my eye about a couple hundred feet above a small mountain and above some high tent ion power lines. then were just hovering there kind of dancing with each other. one would move quickly to the others opposite side then the other would do the same. i ran back into the house to get my wife to see this site. i got her and we went to a back bedroom and looked out the window. they were still there doing the same but a third had appeared above and to there right. the first two then simply vanished. the last one stayed for a minute or so descended a little then vanished as well. 

i'm a twenty year combat veteran of the us army, and a wounded warrior alumni from the san diego  chapter. i was near fatally wounded in fob gamberi afghanistan, 16 april 2011.
content.summary: Glowing yellow,orange light. the size of a asa in the sky

content.detailedDescription: We were stopping by the gas station for gas at. about 1am. we saw this rare challenger and asked to take a photo of it. the gas station is on collier blvd right off of i75.  the following day when we looked at the picture we noticed the strange object. since i dont believe in ufos i decided to return to the site of were we took the photo thinking that maybe it was another set of lights. but there arent any besides that 1. i kno we did not notice it in the sky at the time of the photo
content.summary: We did not see it until we looked at the picture we took

content.detailedDescription: People were pointing and started taking pictures and saying "look it's a ufo" during this highschool football game at our outdoor stadium. my kid also took a couple. it's round and has reddish orange and green flashing lights. it was there and continued on a direct path until it was out of site high in the sky. unable to determine the size or just how high or anything, sorry! we joked about it being a ufo but it did not look like a plane, so it's sort of a mystery lol.
content.summary: Just a blinking round ufo way up in the sky seen by everyone at this outdoor football stadium game tonight

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were leaving the neighborhood at approximately 2115 est, when we both noticed 3 red lights in the sky. she immediately suggested they might be some type of aircraft. i informed her that i am pretty familiar with conventional aircraft, and this was indeed not a conventional craft. we were traveling on chester river beach rd. we moved closer to the ufo, and noticed they were traveling extremely slowly in perfect triangle formation. they resembled reddish orange orbs of fire, almost like a flickering candle. we pulled almost directly underneath the object(s), rolled the windows down in the vehicle, and did not observe any noise whatsoever coming from the object(s). we observed them moving in a straight line path for maybe 45-60 seconds when all 3 orbs disappeared one at a time within about 3 seconds of each other.  they appeared to be relatively close (maybe within a few hundred feet) but it was hard to ascertain exact size or distance from us due to the time of day.
content.summary: 3 red-orange orbs slowly moving in triangle formation

content.detailedDescription:
The first time me and my girlfriend viewed the object was at night on august 31 about 11:00 pm. we took the dog out to the back yard. my girlfriend asked if that was a satellite or a bright star in the sky. i pulled my phone out and opened my star app and held it up toward where the light was and nothing showed. also i did not have my contacts in and i was able to see the lights coming from the object. we came back into the house, i went and put my contacts back in and we then observed the object for over 2 hours from our kitchen window. it hovered and the lights changed color. after 2 hours of watching the object our eyes started to hurt so we went to bed. 
we have been seeing these lights/object every night since and on september 3rd, i was at my mothers house and my girlfriend was at her house. she texted me saying the object was back. i immediately ran out of my moms house which is about 15 miles away, i looked up into the sky in the direction that would be toward her area and i saw the lights as well. we both observed the object from two different places at the same time. this was about 10:30 pm about 20 minutes into observing the object we both from our different locations noticed that it looked to have ejected "glitter" from the bottom of the lights. i went back into my mom's house and grabbed a digital camera and i took 20 pictures over the course of the next 30 minutes watching the object.
we still continue to this day to see the lights in the sky. i used google maps to look to see if there were any military bases or anything industrial in the area, but found nothing in that direction. i did notice that the object seems to hovering over a county park though, north park.
content.summary: Hovering lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Could not sleep, walked outside and it caught my eye because it moving quickly right then left, went and got my binoculars observed it better, could see separate lights and a big x in the middle then saw beams of light coming out the bottom, it stayed in the general area for over 2 hours then finally the sun was starting to come up and it moved north slowly until it disappeared. the object was disc shaped, and changed shape several times, the beams of light coming out the bottom went off, never heard any sound, it was a long ways away but was very easy to see.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed object in the nw sky for over 2 hrs, it would zig right and left but stayed in the general area

content.detailedDescription: We were on vacation on long beach island, nj on august 28, 2014 around 4:30am my dog woke me and was getting sick so i took him outside. the sky is usually extremely clear and you can easily see most constellations -  and this night was not any different - so while my poor dog was walking around puking i sat on the deck staring at the sky - i went inside for a drink and when i came back out i noticed a very large white moon-like light which was surrounded by a swirl of colors (blues green and purple) and it set just to the right of the little dipper - while i stood there staring at it it seemed as if a cloud was forming in front of it (as to hide it) i went inside to get my husband who choose not to get up - so i grabbed my daughters ipad and ran back outside to try to photograph it so i could prove i wasnt crazy - when i came back out it had re-appeared lower in the sky - unfortunately i know nothing of using my daughters i pad and somehow took a photo of the porch behind me - in the meantime the second showing was forming a cloud in front of it as well - then it was gone - my dog was still sick - my husband wouldnt get up - and i suck with electronic but i am not crazy - i know what i saw - i am not saying it was a ufo i have never seen anything like that before and was wondering if anyone else saw it and was lucky enough to find a similar story on your website so i thought i would share mine as well
content.summary: Strange large white light surrounded by a swirl like of colors then seemed to hide itself behind a cloud at 2 different locations

content.detailedDescription: I used to drive up and down the pinal parkway,between catalina,az. and coolidge,az. to get to my job. one afternoon,about 2pm,while driving back to tucson, a silver object caught my eye. my husband was in the airforce and i am familiar with military aircraft in our area. the object was traveling north and looked different. i pulled off the two lane road,and got out of my truck to get a better look. at the same time across the road another car stopped. i didn't say anything to them,as they got out to look also. the silver object was triangle shaped,no sound,no lights and sort of gliding. as i thought to myself,how can it be going so slow and be that big.....The craft speed up in the same direction and was gone in seconds. i almost felt as if it heard me and said " hey watch this"! wasn't scared, just curious. as i went to get in my truck the other people were already in their car.I looked at the driver, and he smiled and shook his head as if, wasn't that odd.......I have always wondered about that,and didn't know of the phoenix lights as of yet. this was clear, blue sky, no clouds and in afternoon. i mentioned the sighting to my husband that night. we wrote it down and i just came across the paper in my desk drawer. wonder if that other couple ever made a report? we seem to have a lot of activity in arizona.. i keep watching the skies........
content.summary: Clear afternoon,driving south,and silver triangle caught my eye

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to my car after leaving the grocery store. right before i put the key in to unlock my car door, for some reason, i did a complete sigh and as my head cocked back i saw this object that was moving faster than any plane and then it just disappeared as if it was cloaking itself. the object had a matte white exterior with a red dome in the front of it and what looked like flames coming out of the back like a booster. then again it looked like a trail of light. it was so fast that it happened for like a second. i just observed so i didn't feel or think anything until it just disappeared in mid air. i stared at the sky for a moment and waited to see if i could see it again but i never did. it made me feel that all my current problems were petty. i ruled out that is was not a plane,jet or a falling star due to it's immediate disappearance and how far up it was. i have never seen any plane or jet that high up in the sky that close to the moon.
content.summary: Extremely fast speed and just disappeared before it got in front of the moon. no clouds were around.

content.detailedDescription:
I have kept this to myself for over 50 years.  
    it was at the time of the cold war and talk of missiles from russia, etc. was heard even by children such as myself.  i cannot clearly recall the time of day but it was near sundown.  i was walking with my father on our way to the grocery store.  about halfway from our home, my father suddenly stopped and was looking up.  i looked up too and saw a "cigar shaped" object sort of a grey color with a black or brown stripe diagonally on it.  i thought it was an airplane at the time. then i thought it could be a missile because it made a hissing sound. there was no trail, or sparks of any kind. as we stared at it it did not appear to move. i remember feeling 'goose bumps' on my skin and a little dizzy.  after what appeared to me about 1 to 3 minutes, my father looked at me and said "don't tell your mother."   his voice was very firm, yet sort of fearful.  he never spoke to me about the incident, and would not allow me to bring it up.
     as time has gone by i have thought it may have been a helicopter..But i heard only the hissing and saw no blades on top.  
     i do not see how in a city that size there were no reports of any other sightings.  i would love to find out that there were other sightings because i feel, frankly, like a fool.  but it has haunted me for so long i thought it about time i speak up.  and even tho i was a child i know what i saw.
content.summary: While walking with my father we noticed this object hovering above the city

content.detailedDescription: Hello. i was requested by dr. stanton friedman to report this sighting to you. in late july, 1968, my grandfather and grandmother were moving into their new residence on the grounds of the tranquille hospital 6 miles from kamloops, bc, canada. my grandfather was starting his new job as medical superintendent of the tranquille hospital. we spent the day unpacking boxes etc. as it was extremely hot (kamloops can get to over 100 degrees during the summer), we all (my grandparents, my mother and father, myself, and my sister) stepped outside to cool down. the time was approximately 10:45 pm. as we were standing in the garden, i happened to look up to the sw sky. i observed 6 bright star-like objects flying in circles around each other. i pointed the lights out to everyone there, and they saw the lights too. it seemed as though the lights were playing a game of tag in the sky. the 6 lights continued to fly in erratic patterns in one spot in the sky, sometimes changing direction 180 degrees instantly. the size of the area in the sky the lights occupied was about the size of a dinner plate held at arms length. we continued to observe the lights for approximately 10 minutes. after 10 minutes, the lights started slowing down, and eventually formed a stationary circle of 6 lights. the lights remained stationary in the circular pattern for about 15 seconds, then they all flew outwards in 6 different directions so fast, they were gone in less than 1/4 second. i estimate the speed they flew off in the 1000's of mph. my grandmother was a believer in extraterrestrials, and was one of the first subscribers to "ufo magazine" in 1967. i asked my grandmother what the lights were, and she immediately said "oh, those were flying saucers" the popular term for ufo's in those days. as a person who grew up fascinated by "the space age", i thought at the time "no big deal". it was like growing up knowing that exotic animals existed in africa but never seeing one, and finally seeing one for the first time in a zoo. i now realize how lucky we all were to have witnessed this amazing occurrence. as a footnote, to this day, tranquille is still a hotspot for ufo sightings. there are large mineral deposits (copper, silver, and gold) in the area, and that may be attracting them to that area.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 6 lights playing

content.detailedDescription: Waiting for my wife to come home standing in my driveway looking at the setting sun i noticed the silhouette of the mtns.I folllowed the nite sky to darkness (west to east) as i looked straight above me i saw a star so i looke above and behind me to the east at that point an object huge object appeared from behind the treeline(appx 50 feet frome where i was standing) moving about 2 mph silently. a series of bright lights in sets of 3 flashed on the underside of object 3 times this happened directly above  me. my dogs were perfectly still looking at this object, thats odd  as it moved west and it cleared the tree line i could see how massive this thing really was. at this point i dont know what to think because in the southern sky i could observe acommrecial aircraft lining up for final approach to dullas i did this for comaritve purposes and this thig did not compare. at this time another seris of lights flashed one in the wet about 1000 feet in front and one in the south about 1000 feet from the object and one in the north about 1000feet from the object these flashed brightly in a triangle shape then as i watched this object vanished to a point.I'ts been almost 2 full years since this happened i'm promted to contact and share this event because something even more profound happened to me sep 1 2014 at approximatley 3am and i think there may be a relation to the two.
content.summary: I saw something huge that defies my 50 years of exsistance

content.detailedDescription: Fast moving small chrome like shimmering object traveling  erratically (lots of changes in altitude as well as trajectory)  west to east looked like it was traveling along palomar airport road corridor...Too fast to be drone, balloon or aircraft. as i was driving the object disappeared after being blocked from my view by trees and buildings. (i was driving north on el camino real in encinitas ca.)
content.summary: Fast moving small chrome like shimmering object traveling  erratically  west to east

content.detailedDescription:
these are photos of 4 ufo’s, though i believe that there were at least 5 in the area.

group 1 ufo’s: img_7563, img_7564, img_7565. also img_7563crop, img_7564crop, img_7565crop.

group 2 ufo’s: img_7566, img_7567, img_7568, (img_7569.Mov 1920x1080p movie), img_7570, img_7566crop, img_7567crop, img_7568crop, img_7570crop.

first sighting: july 22, 2013

second sighting: august 10, 2013 img_507, img_507crop, img_507crop2, img_507crop3

first sighting photos all taken at iso 100 with varying focal lengths. around a 1/4 second exposure. 

first and second sighting photo, (composite ufo image), part of an insert, that i compiled initially for my flickr photo stream.

i have misplaced the original of img_507, this one (i reorganized my storage over the winter), only left with a duplicate of the original. 

the second sighting was on august 10, 2013, near the sailboat club at the end of minnesota point, approximately 5 to 6 miles south east of the original sighting, though off to the east over lake superior. this ufo, seems to the similar to the ones in the movie, and or group 2.

the second sighting photo is not as good, i was not as prepared, and at higher iso, more noise (grainy) in the photo, to enable a capture in darker conditions. i was using a less steady device as a tripod as well. i was photographing other things, and noticed 2 lights over lake superior.

i’ve made an assumption that  the first sighting photos were of ufo’s approximately 5 to 6 miles away, as that i where i saw the second sighting on august 10, 2013. it’s just a guess though.

photography equipment:

canon eos 60d 18mp cmos aps-c size sensor (commonly referred to as a crop body) 

canon zoom lens ef 70-200mm f4 l (a very high grade professional quality lens with superb color, clarity, and sharpness.)

tripod: slik pro 700dx

tripod head: manfrotto 488rc2

manual cable release: canon

all photos as uploaded from camera to apple macbook all exif data original, with one exception, a img_507 a duplicate, and composite, self described.

date: july 22, 2013 and august 10, 2013

time: first sighting photos taken between 8:17 - 8:22 cdt (this was the time stamp, on the exif data, though i believe the time is off by about an hour, as i think the moonrise was after 9:00 pm that evening. ) perhaps the camera time is off, and or daylight savings time. 

location: duluth, minnesota on great lakes aquarium waterfront balcony overlooking duluth harbor facing approximately south east.  

weather: fairly pleasant, skies generally clear, with some clouds.

purpose of photo shoot first sighting: i am a contributor to flickr, having been a member since 2006, i regularly, upload photos of the area, this photo outing, to try and get some photos of the moon rise. as such i had the equipment all preset for such, and on a very sturdy tripod.

group 1 photos (3 of them)

photo 1: img_7563.Jpg monday, july 22, 2013 at 8:19 pm focal length 70mm.  
as i was waiting for the moon to rise, i noticed some lights off in the distance in the sky. i focused the camera on the lights, and took a photo. the lcd screen did not give me any indication of detail, so i wasn’t able to fully appreciate what i had captured, until i got home, and viewed on my computer and a 40” samsung un40d6000sf lcd tv that i use as an extended display with my mac. the photo is best appreciated by zooming in, (i’ve included some crops), as the lights were some ways away, though not sure how far. i suppose it could be extrapolated, by the focal length, size of the lights, etc. 

my frame of mind: a bit of wonder, as to what they could be, they were a bit of a mystery, though at the time, i didn’t draw a conclusion of alien ufo or the like, just a bit of wonder, of what they might be. unusual, and that is why i tried to see what they might be. 


photo 2: img_7564.Jpg,  july 22, 2013 at 8:20 pm focal length 70mm
this one shows, 2 ufo lights, the one dimmer than the other, and upon zooming in, on the lower one, it seems as though a shaded shape is seen. you must zoom in to see the fainter set of lights, (even with the crop).

photo 3: img_7565.Jpg, monday, july 22, 2013 at 8:20 pm focal length 70mm
this photo, shows one lighted ufo, the other one down below, barely noticeable, as a dark unlit blob. 

group 2 photos

photo 4: img_7566.Jpg, monday, july 22, 2013 at 8:20 pm focal length 70mm
this one is lower on the horizon, showing 2 different lighted ufo’s, of a slightly different configuration. these are the 2 ufo”s in the movie as well. (img_7569.Mov)

photo 5: img_7567.Jpg, july 22, 2013 at 8:20 pm focal length 70mm
this one showing 2 the different lighted ufo’s, of a slightly different configuration, again. rising in the sky.

photo 6: img_7568.Jpg, july 22, 2013 at 8:20 pm focal length 70mm
this one showing 2 the different lighted ufo’s, of a slightly different configuration, again. rising in the sky.

photo 7: img_7569.Mov, july 22, 2013 at 8:22 pm 1920x1080h.264 movie (length 01:06 minutes)
1920x1080p movie showing the group 2 lighted ufo’s, rising in the sky.
they were rising in the sky, so i thought to switch from photos, to see if i could get a movie of them. the unusual nature of them, now starting to register as something possibly unusual, and a movie may be a good thing to try and get. i eventually lost focus as they were about to go off of the frame, trying to readjust. near the end, you can see an airliner traveling by,  and at the end, due to losing focus, a bug in the near foreground. i muttered something to myself on the soundtrack near the end as well. this is unaltered, as it came from the camera.

photo 8: img_7570.Jpg, july 22, 2013 at 8:22 pm focal length 70mm
this, switching back to photos, group 2 lighted ufo’s, rising in the sky, one dimmed and barely visible.

i’ve also included img_7562,jpg, showing my location at the back of the great lakes aquarium, taking a test photo of our aerial lift bridge, waiting for the moon rise. this has no ufo interest.


some of the photos are dark initially, (i “stop down” exposure, at times, to enable faster shutter speed), but they do show more detail when zoomed in. i normally upload all my photos into adobe lightroom, and rework as necessary. these are the untouched originals though as downloaded from my camera. 

i decided to upload originals, even though a bit dark, for veracity. i have included cropped copies, to show the center of interest, with some exposure adjustment, that is all, just to lighten them. the exception being img_507 crops, the second sighting photo that i tried to enhance due to them being a bit grainy as the iso was higher. these are better to view and show detail better. i think the best photo is img_7563, the first one, a group 1 photo, as it shows the chain link of lights.

my initial experience with showing others photos, is mixed, interesting to see the variety of reactions, you get “the look,” from some people, so i’ve been reticent to show them to some. i did upload them to flickr initially last year, but took them off, getting weird comments and such, and not wanting to turn my artistic photo stream into a side show. i recently renewed my interest in these, and also found some ufo reports from minnesota  the other day, that mentioned “chain of lights,” so with that in mind thought to offer them for what they are worth.

thanks for your time, and cooperation. hope these can be of use in some way.

i was not able to upload all the photos as i intended, some of them were crops for easier viewing. i created this report on text edit, planning on being able to copy this and upload all photos. most pertinent information can be gathered from the ones i uploaded.

kind regards, [name removed/cms/dr]
content.summary: Viewed, photographed, and took movie of 4 ufo's. lights appeared to be in a chain link of sorts.

content.detailedDescription:
Ok, so am i the only one that saw something odd in the sky tonight? i was looking almost due north around 9:55 pm. just happened to glance up while turning off the sprinklers. there was a bright light, larger than venus about 65 degrees above the horizon. it had no flashing or blinking lights like any commercial or gov't aircraft. in fact, for a moment (maybe like 20 seconds) i couldn't tell if it was moving or stationary. (there is that thing of a point of light against a dark background sometimes looks like it's moving.)

i could then see that it was, in fact, slowly moving by it's position relative to a star. it was going north and possibly slightly west. hard to tell, because it began to dim and get a slightly reddish color, seemed to diminish in size over the next 10 seconds or so, then went completely dark. it's motion was slow, but i have no idea of the actual speed since i don't know it's distance. it moved about 4 or 5 degrees before i lost sight of it.

i checked the sky-watcher websites for satellites, iridium flares or the iss (space station). none were observable at that time, plus the direction of travel, time and area of the sky were all wrong.
content.summary: Bright light moved slow in straight line, then faded completely out.

content.detailedDescription: it was the last weekend of aug in 1993.We were trying to get home to duluth,mn.We were both teachers who had to get back before labor day.I told my family i was going to drive all night to accomplish our goal.We were somewhere south of branson,mo.It was around 3:30 a.M. when a silver pulsating disc decended over the trees weaving in and out and up and down. this happened for what i thought was about 45 minutes.My daughter was very frightened.She was 16 yrs.Old.She was sitting in the passenger's seat and saw everything with me.The next thing that happens is that we are awoken by the mooing of cows facing the pasture.The strange thing was my daughter was no longer next to me. it was my wife.We had purchased a brand new dodge conversion van and i would never let my wife or daughter crawl over a new consol witha colored moniter and sratch it with their shoes especially while driving. it was about 7:30 a.M. my wife was up front and my daughter and son were in back.We missed approximately 4 hours of time.
content.summary: Silver pulsating craft which was disc shaped.At least 100 ft.Long

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting in my back yard ...Beautiful clear bright night.
planes coming and going from east to west as the airport is south of the city.
can see the lights of the small and larger planes flashing.
far above in the clear night air two glowing ,not flashing white lights moved across the sky from north to south.
they were moving slowly,one in front of the other .
as they moved south the one in back disappeared as the one in front kept moving south.This not a one time thing.
content.summary: See things going by most clear, bright nights..

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on porch noticed what appeared to be falling star.Lost sight of it behind tree.Within a minute white orb came over tree,we watched it as it silently and very slowly moved to the south.Not a believer in ufos now i am.It appeared to me like i saw it come from space and enter our world.Not a good time to be out of film.
content.summary: Round white
